title: Highly specific colorimetric detection based on aggregation of L-cysteine functionalized gold nanoparticles for cypermethrin in water samples
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9175-9183
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07626A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thitima Rujiralai, Nitchakarn Leelaharat, Wilairat Cheewasedtham
A fast, simple, and selective sensor using AuNPs@Cyst was proposed for quantifying cypermethrin in the form of hydrolyzed cypermethrin (HCy).
